title: What if someone pick jayce adc, Can I report her?
body:
Hey, riot, what if someone pick jayce adc, What option should I pick to report this noob?

thx for answer

replies.body:
Did they refuse to communicate? Then select "Refusing to Communicate"

Did they go AFK? Then choose the AFK option.

Did they verbally harass or abuse you? Then select the Verbal Abuse option.

Are you just upset because they picked a non-standard pick? Then get over yourself.

It's not optimal, but it can work if you know how to play the match-ups and work to fulfill your role.

I have had allies play Talon, Ashe, and Katarina support who out-performed traditional supports in laning and teamfights. 

Besides, what may seem to be an off-meta pick may work surprisingly well in the correct situation.  

Leblanc Support, Lee Sin Support, Morgana/Annie/Zyra Support (when they were typically mid-lane picks), Kennen ADC, and Varus Mid are all examples of champions successfully being played in a (then) non-traditional role for that champion.  

It can be frustrating at times (depending on the situation), but it's not a reportable offense.
